Articles.Content: Is there any way to blacklist planets from this? Through some planet packs I'm having a wormhole being listed for a landing mission, so I'd rather not have it clogging it up, alongside some binary stars at the center wanting flybys.

Do you install EVERYTHING in your contracts folder?

...also Is it compatible with the OPM?

(Outer Planets Mod)

On 3/9/2023 at 11:48 PM, jbarry39 said:

Do you install EVERYTHING in your contracts folder?

...also Is it compatible with the OPM?

(Outer Planets Mod)

Yeah just extract the ContractsPack folder to your GameData folder. If you use other Contract Pack mods they should just be merged to the same folder.

And yes it's compatible with OPM. Generates the contracts itself, so you can add new planets and they'll be added to the pool of possible targets. Compatible with basically any planet pack and system replacement from my understanding, just perhaps minor weird interactions with non-planets like I'm having above.

Is there a way to change what body it wants me to start exploring? It keeps giving me Eve, but that's got 266 days until its transfer window (compared to, say, Duna with 38, Jool with 19, and Moho with 5)

Edited May 26, 2023 by XxRedwoodxX

im getting a "fly by maelg" contract in Kcalbeloh (star around a black hole) right after i finished did suluco's (homeworld) moon tot, problem is that suluco is around sunorc (a different star) and i dont nearly have the technology to commit to this

2 minutes ago, Keko said:

im getting a "fly by maelg" contract in Kcalbeloh (star around a black hole) right after i finished did suluco's (homeworld) moon tot, problem is that suluco is around sunorc (a different star) and i dont nearly have the technology to commit to this

Take it up with your Planet Pack author. E+ uses the same progression as the stock contracts.  It decides this based on the Science Multiplier. So if you're getting the wrong body next then the Science Multiplier for that body is off.
Hey Folks. Anyone having an idea, why the "Orbit body X"-Contracts keep permanently reappearing after completition? It's as if the objective never has been completed.
